QuestData.Title: Gol Koval
QuestData.Description:
A group of hunters went up into the hills awhile ago and we haven't heard back from them.
My niece is up there and it isn't like her to be out of touch for so long! Would you please find her?
She was headed towards Gol Koval.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Rebecca Hale in Gol Koval.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Rebecca Hale in Gol Koval.
QuestData.RewardText: My aunt sent you? Oh, Light bless that woman.
